recipe_name: Chorizo sausage roll with red onion marmalade
author: Tony Tobin
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Wrap the pastry strips around the chorizo and brush with the beaten egg. Place onto a baking sheet and place into the oven to bake for 10 minutes, or until the pastry is golden. For the marmalade, place the oil in a saucepan over a medium heat. Add the onions and fry for three minutes to soften. Add the remaining ingredients and cook for 7-8 minutes, or until thickened. To serve, slice the sausage roll into three pieces and place onto a plate with a tablespoonful of the marmalade alongside.
ingredients: 3 x 5cm/2in strips ready-made puff pastry,  1 cooking chorizo sausage, skin removed,  1 egg, beaten,  1 tbsp olive oil,  ½ red onion, thinly sliced,  2 tbsp soft brown sugar,  1 tbsp tomato purée,  1 tbsp red wine vinegar
